column4: my samsung q45 did not work with linux until jaunty. now it works (actually boots!) and i cannot get the intel gm945 graphics working :S i thought intel graphics worked out of the box
jaunty had some problems with intel graphics
are there any known fixes or do i just have to wait?
I'm not sure.. I haven't read up on it any more, I don't have any computers with intel graphics.. it might already be fixed for all I know
